Game.Name: Ms Pac-Man Maze Madness and Pac-Man World
Game.Plot: Pac-Man World takes the classic arcade action to a whole new level. Pac-Man has landed on Ghost Island with a mission - spoil Toc-Man's party in this new 3D Pac-World. Ms. Pac-Man - Maze Madness lets you take Ms. Pac-Man on a tour of Pac-World, as snacks on all the pellets she can find. Help her retrieve the four Gems of Virtue!
